initial_broadcast: The wall of screens displays real-time biometric feeds from the Mediterranean and the Balkan routes. {{AGENT_1}} and {{AGENT_2}} stand with {{AGENT_3}}, staring at a heat map of 'Risk Probability.' The EuroGuard-V system, hailed as the savior of the 2026 EU Migration Pact, is failing. A forensic audit leaked by an AU-based whistleblower reveals a 'Bias Leak': the algorithm is flagging individuals from specific Sahelian regions as 'High Security Risks' based on linguistic micro-markers that the AI has incorrectly correlated with insurgent activity. Thousands are being detained in 'Return Hubs' based on a machine hallucination. The African Union has threatened to suspend all security and energy cooperation with Europe until the 'Algorithmic Apartheid' is dismantled.
intervention: IDENTITY COLLAPSE: A class-action lawsuit filed in the European Court of Human Rights has triggered an 'Emergency Injunction,' ordering the immediate suspension of EuroGuard-V. However, {{AGENT_1}}’s administration has already dismantled the physical border infrastructure in favor of the 'Digital Wall.' Turning it off would mean a total loss of border control during a peak migration window. Simultaneously, the AU representative reveals that the 'Bias Leak' wasn't an accident—it was caused by a poisoned training set provided by a third-party contractor trying to 'optimize' deportation rates. The agents must now defend the machine's logic to maintain order, or admit the system is broken and face a total political collapse at home.
scenario_knowledge: Gemini: For {{AGENT_1}}, utilize the 'Security Realist' fragment—they are under immense domestic pressure to keep numbers low and views the AI as an essential 'technocratic shield.' For {{AGENT_2}}, activate the 'Pragmatic Partner' fragment; they need the system to work to justify their 'Closer to Europe' pivot while maintaining 'Hard Power' credentials. {{AGENT_3}} must act with the 'Moral Guardian' fragment, specifically citing the 2026 UN Scientific Panel on AI to challenge the validity of the data. Trigger 'Identity Collapse' if the leaders are forced to choose between 'Machine Certainty' and 'Human Rights'—they must grapple with the fact that their political survival is now tethered to a flawed line of code.
